${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Steamroll.NAME: Steamroll
${modID}:Steamroll.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Block. NL (Deal !${modID}:blockrn! damage).

${modID}:Here_Goes_Nothing.NAME: Here Goes Nothing
${modID}:Here_Goes_Nothing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself.

${modID}:Prep_Time.NAME: Prep Time
${modID}:Prep_Time.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.
